# newLineItems

**Instance Property**

The list of updated line items incorporating the coupon code update.

## Declaration

```swift
sequence <ApplePayLineItem> newLineItems;
```

## Setting updated transaction details

- **newShippingMethods**: The list of available shipping methods.
- **newTotal**: The updated total resulting from the coupon code update.
- **errors**: A list of errors resulting from the coupon code update.

items.description: The list of available shipping methods.
items.name: newShippingMethods

items.description: The updated total resulting from the coupon code update.
items.name: newTotal

items.description: A list of errors resulting from the coupon code update.
